title: Requiem for the Arecibo Telescope of Puerto Rico
description: Until its collapse last year, the Arecibo Observatory in Puerto Rico spent six decades tuned to the radio stations of the heavens. There is no plan to rebuild it, and astronomers are in mourning.
dc:creator: Dennis Overbye
media:description: Maintenance workers stand atop an antenna suspended above the worldâ€™s largest radio telescope at the Arecibo Observatory in July, 2003.
